name: Mechanical Genius
description:
Through your mechanical genius, you have utilized Canthan jade technology to build a customized battle mech that will fight at your side.
Your mech inherits a percentage of all of your combat attributes except precision, which is added to its own. This bonus is reduced if your mech moves too far away from you.
Your tool belt skills are replaced with Mech Commands, customized by your trait choices.
Gain access to signet utility skills.
Bonuses from Mech Frame traits are also affected by the out-of-range penalty.
